name: conduit
description: Conduit is a simple data pipeline tool for loading and transforming csv files

scripts.start: concurrently "cd server && python -m uvicorn main:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000" "cd client && npm start" "python -m dagster dev -m server.app.dagster.repo -p 3500"
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd server && python -m uvicorn main:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000" "cd client && npx serve -s build --single -l 3000" "python -m dagster dev -m server.app.dagster.repo -p 3500 --host 0.0.0.0"
